mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.channel_type_id AS channelTypeId, dct.text as text,dct.color as color, ifnull(sum(p.fee_paid),0) payTypeMoney FROM record_charge r LEFT JOIN charge_pay p ON p.charge_id = r.id LEFT JOIN dict_channel_type dct ON dct.id = p.channel_type_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND toll_collector_id = #{toll_collector_id} AND p.charge_id = r.id AND p.STATUS = 1 AND r.turn_status=#{turnStatus} GROUP BY p.channel_type_id ) a, (SELECT ifnull(sum( p.fee_refund), 0 ) AS refund, ifnull(sum( p.fee_paid), 0 ) AS totalMoney FROM record_charge r LEFT JOIN charge_pay p ON p.charge_id = r.id LEFT JOIN dict_channel_type dct ON dct.id = p.channel_type_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND toll_collector_id = #{toll_collector_id} AND p.charge_id = r.id AND p.STATUS = 1 AND r.turn_status=#{turnStatus} ) b
select * from record_charge where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update record_charge set turn_status = 1 where id=#{id}
